body.name: Tramontina Professional Nonstick Fry Pan Aluminum 12 inch, 80114/536DS, Made in Brazil
features: Works with gas, electric and ceramic glass, oven-safe (400 F/204 C)
body.description: Tramontina's Professional Restaurant Fry Pans are designed and manufactured to withstand the rigors of a professional kitchen, and easily adapt to home and non-commercial use. Ideal for frying, scrambling, sautéing, and searing your favorite recipes, the fry pans' commercial-grade, heavy-gauge aluminum construction distributes heat quickly and evenly, while the reinforced nonstick interior allows food to easily release from the pan providing effortless cooking and cleanup. The cast stainless steel handle is triple-riveted for added support and features a removable, silicone, soft-grip for versatility and maneuverability. This cookware is NSF certified, compatible with gas, electric and ceramic glass cooktops, can be used in the oven up to 400 degrees Fahrenheit (204 degrees Celsius). MADE IN USA with imported components and offered under a Lifetime Warranty.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Tramontina 80114/536DS Professional Aluminum Nonstick Restaurant Fry Pan, 12" Tramontina's Professional 12 in Restaurant Fry Pan is designed and manufactured to withstand the rigors of a professional kitchen, and easily adapt to every day use. The fry pan's commercial-grade, heavy-gauge aluminum construction distributes heat quickly and evenly, while the reinforced nonstick interior allows food to easily release from the pan providing effortless cooking and cleanup. The cast stainless steel handle is riveted for added support and features a removable, silicone, soft-grip for versatility and maneuverability. Ideal for personal every-day useHeavy-gauge aluminum alloyPFOA-free reinforced nonstick coatingCast stainless steel handle with three solid alloy rivetsRemovable silicone gripCompatible with gas, electric and ceramic glass cooktopsOven-safe up to 400°F / 204°CDishwasher-safeTramontina Professional Collection

Use and care Before using your pan for the first time, hand-wash with warm, soapy water. Rinse and dry thoroughly, then season by lightly rubbing cooking oil onto the cooking surface and heating over medium heat for two to three minutes. When cool, hand-wash in warm, soapy water, then rinse and dry thoroughly.Do not use nonstick aerosol cooking sprays in your nonstick pan. They will leave a residue, which may be difficult to remove and will cause foods to stick to the pan.To preserve the look and performance of your pan, we recommend using silicone, nylon, bamboo or wood utensils when cooking. Regardless of how hard the cooking surface is, using metal utensils or sharp objects may damage the cooking surface over time.Cooking using low to medium heat only. Since aluminum yields excellent conductivity and delivers even heat distribution, the usage of high heat is not necessary. In fact, the use of high heat can permanently discolor and damage your pan.Keep the pan on the burner only during the necessary time for cooking. Do not overheat empty pan.Always use protective mitts to safely handle a hot pan.Avoid sudden temperature changes such as immersing hot pan in cold water. Always let the pan cool before washing.When using your pan on ceramic glass stovetops, always lift (do not slide) to move to avoid scratching the cooktop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'm a huge fan of this pan!
reviews.reviewText: I'm not the best cook in the word, in that I use a pan to cook literally everything. I also had no clue a 12 inch form factor even existed.That being said, this is my new favorite pan and daily driver. The large size serves several purposes:excellent heat distribution, a lot of room, and in my experience, less smoke while cooking, which is an absolute blessing when living in an apartment!The handle is also far from the Pan itself so as to never heat up and cause burns if you lift it bare handed,and the nonstick treatment held up better than basically any other Teflon less pan I've ever owned (which coincidently also makes it a breeze to clean!).The only downside is its size, you can probably only fit one more burner alongside this guy, so be forewarned.The ONLY

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Works as described. I use it practically every day. Food doesn't stick and so easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Has held up well
reviews.reviewText: My wife (who is a great cook) and I have tried numerous pans over the years with varying degrees of satisfaction. When we had to toss out our last pan after only a couple of months, I did a fair amount of internet research. As is typical on the Net, no product is all good and few are all bad. I settled on the Tramontina and am happy with the choice. It is a good size for a wide variety of needs, it heats up fairly fast with an even heat distribution, and the non-stick surfaces has held up really well (after 2+ years). The only "down side" we have found is that the long handle makes it difficult to store in a drawer (we hang ours in the kitchen pantry - problem easily solved with a nail).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best "Bang For Your Buck" Nonstick Pan
reviews.reviewText: We purchased this after our reliable non-stick pan finally needed replacing from years of faithful service. This pan received good marks in a few online comparisons I read. Although we don't utilize a non-stick skillet a lot, it's invaluable for certain tasks. We are happy to report this has performed flawlessly since receiving it. Eggs, fish, anything we've thrown at it has been successful. The construction is sturdy, the weight is substantial and the removable silicon handle is a bonus! It's oven safe up to 400F with the handle and 500F without. Like most cookware, it has a few "hot spots" but cooking, in general, produces even heat - at least, as good as you can expect. No issues. We can confidently recommend. Great value too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A great skillet that might be too big
reviews.reviewText: There are a lot of things to love about this skillet. 1) It's large enough to handle a lot of food. 2) The handle is long enough that there's very little danger of getting burned if something splatters. 3) It's very sturdy. 4) It heats up quickly and very evenly. 5) The nonstick coating is perfectly even and probably thick enough to use metal utensils, although I never do.But there are problems, too. 1) Even though it's a 12-inch skillet, it's substantially larger than the 12-inch skillet I bought it to replace. 2) So large in fact that I can only use very small saucepans on the burner beside it and behind it on my standard size range. 3) The handle is so long that it will only fit in the dishwasher if I push the end of the handle up into the rack above it. 4) It's very heavy, even before you put anything in it. 5) The extra weight makes it necessary to remove food with a spatula or tongs or spoon instead of pouring it out over the edge the way you' might do browned hamburger meat, for example.All in all, it's a great skillet that I may have to replace anyway.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Truly non-stick, very easy clean up
reviews.reviewText: I have only positive things to say. This pan performs as advertised, being non-stick, easy to clean, and cooking food just right. It appears to be sturdy as well. I’d bought the smaller one first as an egg pan and was sold on the line.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a joy to cook with Tramontina Professional Nonstick
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the 8”, 10” , & 12” Tramontina Professional Nonstick pans. They are such a joy to cook with! The first time my Husband used one of the pans , I was out & he called to thank me for getting these pans ! In his words “ what a joy to cook with these !” They are sturdy, the heat seems to be evenly distributed in the pan, & the silicone on the handle gives you a firm grip without the threat of being burned . I would highly recommend these pans .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars After a year, works and looks great
reviews.reviewText: I waited a year to leave this review because so many of the negative reviews claimed the pan eventually falls apart. Well, after a year I can say the pan still looks like new. Now, I treat it well (no metal utensils, don't leave it on high heat, don't leave it to soak in the sink overnight), and don't use it every day, but it is our primary large skillet and it has held up perfectly. And it cooks well too, I have no complaints at all. Excellent value for the money in my opinion!

reviews.reviewTitle: Great pan, wish it had a lid
reviews.reviewText: Great nonstick pan, works great, easy to clean. Wish it came with a lid. Couldn't even find one to buy separately.

reviews.reviewTitle: The Tramontina Professional Nonstick Fry Pan Aluminum 12 inch true to its ranking
reviews.reviewText: The Tramontina Professional Nonstick Fry Pan Aluminum 10 inch was listed as the best non-stick frying pan for 2023 in the US and the second best in Canadian listings. I went with the 12 inch professional because we like the 12 inch size. It is a pleasure to work with, easy to clean, handle stays cool. The US listing was based on more than 10,000 positive comments, which influenced the Canadian rating, and I have to agree it is a great tool. Good buy, great service.
These pans are perfect, nothing sticks to them, they heat perfectly and clean up perfectly
